mapper.select: SELECT CODE, FDATE, MENU, PHOTO FROM FOOD WHERE SUBSTR(code,1,1) = SUBSTR((SELECT CODE FROM MEMBER WHERE id = #{id}),1,1) ORDER BY FDATE ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FOOD (CODE, FDATE, MENU, PHOTO) VALUES(#{code}, TO_DATE(#{fdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{menu}, #{photo})
mapper.select: SELECT CODE, FDATE, MENU, PHOTO FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY FDATE ASC) AS RNUM, CODE, FDATE, MENU, PHOTO FROM FOOD WHERE SUBSTR(code,1,1) = SUBSTR((SELECT CODE FROM MEMBER WHERE id = #{id}),1,1) ORDER BY FDATE ASC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM FOOD WHERE SUBSTR(code,1,1) = SUBSTR((SELECT CODE FROM MEMBER WHERE id = #{id}),1,1) ORDER BY FDATE ASC
